text: Fuchs in 2007. Bruce A. Fuchs is an American immunologist and health science administrator. He was the director of the Office of Science Education (OSE) at the National Institutes of Health. On October 1, 2013, OSE ceased operations and Fuchs was reassigned. He works as a health science administrator in the Office of Research Infrastructure Programs and oversees programs pertaining to career development. He is the primary contact for F30/F31 and SERCA K01 applications and the Diversity and Re-Entry Supplements. Fuchs' expertise is in immunology and brain immune interactions. == Selected publications == * * * * * * == References == Category:20th-century American biologists Category:21st-century American biologists Category:National Institutes of Health people Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:American immunologists
title: Bruce Fuchs
